description: Request for an Environmental Impact Assessment (EIA) Scoping Opinion under Regulation 15 of the Town and Country Planning (Environmental Impact Assessment) Regulations 2017 (as amended), in respect of a Proposed Development comprising the  demolition of 101 Whitechapel High Street, 2 - 6 Commercial Street and the western annex of the Canon Barnett Primary School; partial demolition and partial retention of 102 - 105 Whitechapel High Street (with  internal alterations); and redevelopment to provide approximately 37,500m2 of office and retail (Class E) accommodation; relocation and expansion of the existing school playground; erection of a single storey community facility (Class F2), with associated cycle parking, hard and soft landscaping and other associated works.
site_name: Site at 2-6 Commercial Street, 98 and 101-105 Whitechapel High Street, Commercial Street, London
